Class AutomaticRangeCalculator

  • java.lang.Object

    RangeCalculator

    public class AutomaticRangeCalculator
extends BaseObject
implements RangeCalculator

    A range calculator that calculates the range based on the actual data range.

      • isIncludeZero

        public boolean isIncludeZero()
        Get the zero inclusion flag.

        If true, the calculated range will always include zero.

        Returns:
        The current zero inclusion flag.
